gallery.name: ALIVE
gallery.info: Developed an E-learning platform for New York University with MERN stack. Worked with UI team to ship responsive and isomorphic website for multiple browsers, monitors. Also messed around with API design and UI.
gallery.answer: MongoDB, Express, React/Redux, Node, GraphQL, Figma

gallery.name: Spotify Data Viz
gallery.info: A web app to visualize user's profile, playlists, followers, recently played songs. Also includes the frequently played song for within 4 weeks and 6 months. Songs include detailed sound information. Create and modify your playlists with recommended songs based on your playlists and more.
gallery.answer: React, Node, Express, REST API, Styled-Component, Mixins

gallery.name: Food Zone
gallery.info: E-commerce website with User auth, check out with PayPal, add items to cart, admin upload, edit product, manage orders, post review, search, and sort products.
gallery.answer: React, Redux, Node, Express, MongoDB, Material UI, AWS, Heroku, JWT

gallery.name: Fruit Chat
gallery.info: Web app for cloning twitter's functionality such as post, comment, like, notification, deletion. Includes user authorization with JSON Web Token to manage login, register, and session. Responsive and minimal design for the chat app.
gallery.answer: React, Redux, NodeJS, Express, Material UI, Firebase, REST API, JWT

gallery.name: Route Tracking
gallery.info: React Native app for real-time tracking user's route with expo-location library, fetch tracks records, and store tracks details.
gallery.answer: React, React Native, Node, MongoDB, NPM, Expo, JWT

gallery.name: Letgo Furniture
gallery.info: React Native app for selling furniture, includes user authentication and authorization, post listings, contact the seller, and more.
gallery.answer: React, React Native, Node, NPM, Expo

gallery.name: To Do List
gallery.info: Add/delete task, categorize task, light/dark mode, accessibility, quick add task.
gallery.answer: React, Firebase, React Testing Library, SCSS

gallery.name: COVID Tracker
gallery.info: Used REST API to fetch data and Chart.js to display COVID-19 data.
gallery.answer: React, REST API, CSS Modules, Chart.js

gallery.name: Quiz Generator
gallery.info: Web app with REST API to generate quiz by category and number.
